normalize_waypoints.title: Normalize Waypoints
normalize_waypoints.desc: Sometimes waypoint rotation is weirdly tilted. This will normalize all waypoints to be straight up (make rotation x,y = 0).

auto_rotate_waypoints.title: Auto Rotate Waypoints
auto_rotate_waypoints.desc: This will automatically rotate all waypoints based on their neighbors position.

delete_waypoint.title: Delete Waypoint
delete_waypoint.desc: Are you sure you want to delete this waypoint?

map.click_lock: Right click to lock supply line

home.desc_title: MotorTown's premier community server in Southeast Asia
home.description: Where friendly and passionate players push their skills to the limit. Race across diverse terrains, design eye-catching liveries, and fine-tune your cars to claim victory in our weekend events. We host regular races and creative competitions, and even run our own radio station. Join our Discord to get involved and stay up to speed!
